alert.note: Alert for Gilliam; Morrow (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 20 at 7:36PM PDT until May 20 at 8:15PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pendleton Oregon has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Morrow County in northeastern Oregon... Southeastern Gilliam County in north central Oregon... * Until 815 PM PDT. * At 735 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Hardman, or 22 miles south of Heppner, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hardman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
